name: MAAD
description: Hello: In MAAD we are crazy, maybe because in another language, that means our name, or maybe because we alter a word by adding an "A".Â Are not those so-called madmen who have made way for great changes and ideas? If that's what madness is all about, then yes, we're definitely crazy. Crazy about digital marketing, for being creative, risky, innovative. Crazy to open doors and show them a comprehensive path that we will travel together to reach very high.
